caption.center: JOHN McCLENDON, Petitioner v. WORKERS' COMPENSATION APPEAL BOARD (TASTY

court.center: Supreme Court of Pennsylvania, Eastern District.

opinion.posture: No. 463 EAL 2004, Petition for Allowance of Appeal from the Order of the Commonwealth Court.
opinion.opinion_text: AND NOW, this 30th day of December 2004, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is hereby DENIED.
